Text:
Wow, Just listened to the CBC Radio The Current with Anna Maria Tremonti's Nov 2 interview with Chris Hedges on the crisis in the American economy. see (http://www.cbc.ca/thecurrent/2010/11/nov-0210---pt-3-american-liberalism.html

Scary stuff. This video won't be anymore hopeful, I am sure. A very important torrent. Namaste, Temptation- My heart goes out to all Americans.
